content:
本件保存七年
05-62- 2449
August 11, 2
MEMORANDUM
To : Mr. R. L. Hirshberg Program Officer, US AID/C
From : C. C. Chang
Original signed by Chief, Second Division C. C. Chang
Subject : Excess Equipment
We are in receipt of, from P/SP, copy each of Amendment No.1 to Purchase Orders No. E59-009, No,E59-013 and No.E59-022 covering the procurement of excess equipment as follows:
E59-009
Crane, crawler Oscillograph
US$15,088.00
E59-013
US$ 1,320.00
E59-022
Insulation tape & others
US$ 210.00
These amendments change the funding from Project 484-22-494, PIO/C 90532 to Project 484-Y-99-AX, PIO/C 20097 and were made without CUSA's concurrence.
It is noted that to finance the above purchases under Project 484-22-494, PIO/C 90532 was requested by CUSA and agreed to by US AID/C. Therefore, it is requested that these amend- ments be cancelled immediately.
Your prompt action and reply will be appreciated.
cc: 2D
G-16. 13.2

(2) 218 Academia Historica

paragraphs.content: To : Mr. R. L. Hirshberg Program Officer, US AID/C
Original signed by Chief, Second Division C. C. Chang
We are in receipt of, from P/SP, copy each of Amendment No.1 to Purchase Orders No. E59-009, No,E59-013 and No.E59-022 covering the procurement of excess equipment as follows:
These amendments change the funding from Project 484-22-494, PIO/C 90532 to Project 484-Y-99-AX, PIO/C 20097 and were made without CUSA's concurrence.

It is noted that to finance the above purchases under Project 484-22-494, PIO/C 90532 was requested by CUSA and agreed to by US AID/C. Therefore, it is requested that these amend- ments be cancelled immediately.
Your prompt action and reply will be appreciated.
